Interview with Adewale Oshineye at SCNA 2012

Interviewee: Adewale Oshineye
Topic: software craftsmanship and practice
Conference: SCNA 2012
Description: Interview with Adewale Oshineye at Software Craftsmanship North America 2012 on software craftsmanship and practice. This recording captures practical lessons and perspective for software teams and technical communities.
